name: bangla-dev-cheatsheet
description: A Bangla developer cheatsheet website built with Next.js and Hero UI. Cheatsheets are written in markdown under /data folder for tools like Git, Linux, and Terminal.
features: Localized in Bangla using SolaimanLipi font
Cheatsheet content from markdown files in /data
Home page displays cheatsheet cards with icons and titles
Custom cursor interactions for hover and focus states
Code sections styled with Consolas font

folders.data: Contains markdown files for each cheatsheet (e.g. git.md, linux.md)
folders.app: Next.js app directory for pages and layout
folders.context: Holds React context files like CursorContext.js

goal: Enable developers to browse Bangla-language cheatsheets for popular tools in a clean, modern UI.
